title: (Non) Sibi Culture
description: 'Non Sibi' is a fundamental value of our school community. But how well do we live up to it?

questions.text: Do you agree with the following statement?
questions.description: “My peers embody 'non sibi' on a daily basis.”

questions.text: Do you agree with the following statement?
questions.description: “My peers took Non Sibi Day seriously.”

questions.text: If Non Sibi Day were optional, would you participate?
